interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sam&Helen Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit, 5Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes And 2 Tubes Magnetic Eyeliners With Eyelash Applicator-No Glue Needed
Review Date: 2020/07/29
Store: Sam&Helen
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sam&Helen', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: What I love about these magnetic lashes set is the lashes, you get 5 full sets of lashes that are all voluminous and look great on. The problem is the liner its, not the greatest, it's tacky and doesn't hold the lashes as well as other sets I have tried. I use the lashes with other liners and they work.
Review Title: Great Lashes, poor liner
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

My teenager is a nail fanatic, she changes her nail color at least twice a week. She loves using this dryer, it's easy to operate and cuts down on drying time. It was harmless, and it works with all kinds of nail polish, not just Gel. It is really fast and would be great if you are in a hurry. My daughter approves

Cehomi
{'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Cehomi', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.94 x 6.74 x 2.74 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Thick, Thin', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.94 x 6.74 x 2.74 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '742186023960'}
These are cute in the picture and they look adorable in my kid's hair, but they are inconsistent, only two have the really long material and they are not the best colors to match any of our clothes. The others have the short little ties and they just feel really cheap. They come pretied and all of the shorter Scrunchies are dull in color. My older kids like to wear them on their wrist but they don't like these they felt itchy, We will still wear them but mostly around the house.
Mixed Lot
Wbfwbb 5 Pcs Cheetah Scrunchie Hair Scrunchies Velvet Elastic Hair Bands Scrunchy Bobbles Soft Hair Ties Ropes Scrunchie for Women or Girls Hair Accessories - 5 Leopard Assorted Color Scrunchies
Wbfwbb

Really cute set of functional scrunchies. These are really well made and hold up hair all day. I like that each one is different, they are each super soft made with a velvet feeling material. These are great for putting up your hair in a quick minute.
Velvety Scrunchies
9 Pack Headbands Set -Messen Fashion Velvet Wide Hairband with Pearl Knitted Floral Fabric Cute Elegant Vintage Cross Knot Turban Elastic Hair Hoop Headwrap for Women Girls Hair Accessories
Messen
{'Package Dimensions': '10.8 x 6.6 x 2.1 inches; 14.07 Ounces'}
I have 4 daughters and we all wear these headbands. These are very comfortable and we really like the turban style more than the pearl, it just looks really fancy. We wear the turban headbands for everyday wear, they wear them to school, which I like it keeps their hair out of there eyes.  These are all sturdy and comfortable, with no irritation to my head or behind my ears. I wear them and my kids all wear these so they fit everyone. I like that the fabric covers the entire band so nothing is sticking or poking your head. This set has 9 headbands my daughter has one on and not pictured.
Cute for my kids hair
Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes
Eyenjoy
{'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'}
I am in love with this Magnetic Eyelashes kit. I have tried other brands before and really hated the eyeliner. This set has a precision eyeliner. It goes on so smooth and straight really love it and it makes the eyelashes to stick easily. I will say that you have to really apply a good amount of eyeliner all the way across the lid for the magnetic strips to work. It does take time and practice to really get the hang of these, but I find them so much easier than glue.
Magnetic Eyelashes

Sam&Helen

What I love about these magnetic lashes set is the lashes, you get 5 full sets of lashes that are all voluminous and look great on. The problem is the liner its, not the greatest, it's tacky and doesn't hold the lashes as well as other sets I have tried. I use the lashes with other liners and they work.
Great Lashes, poor liner
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Key Interests:** Nail care, at-home beauty solutions, gel nail polish, hair accessories, eyelash enhancement products, and innovative eye makeup solutions.
- **User Demographic:** Likely a parent of multiple children, including teenagers who enjoy nail art, hairstyles, and makeup.
- **Usage Patterns:** Frequently changes nail colors (at least twice a week) and actively seeks a variety of hair accessories and eye makeup products that emphasize ease of use, showcasing a versatile approach to beauty.
- **Product Preferences:** Values convenience, comfort, and fast results in beauty products, now extending to eye makeup. Recent purchases highlight a preference for high-quality, functional items suitable for both adult and children's beauty routines.
- **Safety and Versatility:** Prefers products that are safe for different hair types and compatible with various occasions, demonstrating a commitment to safety and multifunctionality.
- **Quality Expectations:** Seeks salon-quality results at home, with a consistent focus on innovative solutions that deliver both on functionality and aesthetics. The user has recently shown a willingness to adapt and use alternative products to enhance overall beauty.

The user’s latest experience with eyelash products emphasizes their ongoing priority for convenience and quality while still being discerning about product performance, particularly with ease of use compared to traditional options.
